messages.messageBody:
http://www.the-shinsengumi.com/douga09.htm
has Nagakura Shinpachi's jinbaori...the items shown are NOT NHK
Taiga props...they are all in a museum...the guide points to an old
vest and says "Nagakura Shinpachi" jinbaori!!!!!
